title: MD
biography: Radha Krishna Sinha was an Indian scholar of English literature. He came from a family of elite intellectuals and academics. He was a DPhil from the University of Oxford and the head of the Department of English, Patna University. All his children and grandchildren teach English Literature.
aiSummary: P. R. Sinha is a gi cancer surgery specialist with an H-index of 83 at Oncology (Member). Has been published in Science, Aerosol Science and Technology, Nature Geoscience. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
